examples: doctors are working hard to keep him alive

definitions.text: (often followed by `with') full of life and spirit
examples: she was wonderfully alive for her age

definitions.text: having life or vigor or spirit
examples: became very animated when he heard the good news
is alive to the moods of others
alive to what is going on
awake to the dangers of her situation
was now awake to the reality of his predicament
the volcano is very much alive
